name: Backbone Technology
description:
Full-service Vancouver web development company offering integrated digital design and creative services along with custom application development, e-business solutions, and server/network administration. We also offer consulting on all of our areas of expertise.
We are committed to our clients; our business is based on strong relationships, trust, and exceeding expectations. As a client at Backbone you become our family; your visions and ideas become our passion, and your goals become our successes.
We have been producing and maintaining enterprise-level online solutions for over a decade and many of our very first clients are still working with us because of the exceptional results they have achieved. Currently, Backbone supports hundreds of clients both nationally and internationally ranging from online storefronts and publicly-traded corporations to government ministries and political organizations. In other words, we are no strangers to large-scale projects, high-security web architecture, and complex systems integration.
No matter how difficult your project may seem, we will deliver terrific results with your company's future in mind.
READ MORE...
